KSLawDogg Liono gets away with everything and is a bad RPG'er, and i wasn't
going to blow up Autobots or Decepticons for kicks, i was tryng to write a
good story......the setup to that was an ultimate showdown between Sinesis
and Suukie which will occur later......now, listen, Plintissa had to do
something, RGDan wouldn't reply to my posts.....so listen here, he said
this: Planatas (he spells everyone's name wrong) you cannot harm me my aura
beam disallows it turns on shield blocking Planatas star shot and making the
star disappear (he never acepts damage, thinks he's the greatest ever, and
he cannot just take everyone's weapons away, that's moding!) uses his
burning lion attack that will cause damage and burn her protoform. and
that's what he said.....also moding because he said i HAD to acept damage,
now listen here, so i said that Plintissa takes the star back and avoids his
attack.... (because my characters hardly ever avoid attacks) and she threw a
spin kick at him..he didn't respond.....then later he said he made her
weapon disappear for good....so i revealed that she stole another
one..because he can't do that!.....and now Tigerhawk is complaining that
Plintissa always blames others for what she does....she never did that, so
it looks like Tigerhawk is really the one blaming others for stuff that HE
does......i know you can hear me, RGDan, Plintissa left the Maximals to get
away from YOU.......thought i had to get that off of my chest.........whew!
you have to tell the truth!....
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 6:34 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars - Saga


> (Code, (no offense meant to Liono), but yes, RgDan does mode.  But just
> because he modes numerous times, does NOT mean you get to, and it's no
> excuse.  RgDan has been spoken too, and if nothing is done by him, further
> action will be taken.  Heck, I don't really agree with 'Stinger being able
to
> move the Autobots and Decepticons where ever that person wants, I think of
it
> as a little along the lines of moding.  But if that wasn't done, we'd have
> people joining the Maximal side just so they could go off and blow up
> Autobots and Decepticons for kicks.  Just try and not do such impossible
> stuff)
>
> Koga Shuko/Unitron:
>

> accompanied by Unitron, whom had 'boarded' their ship::

Beast

> ::Jumping to conclusions, Koga Shuko pulled out two laser pistols, opening
> fire on Hell Beast::
>
> "I'll take the little one!" Unitron yelled, pulling out his custom-made
laser
